header.title5: What if we make it real together?
header.imgAlt: MacBook laptop illuminated with purple, blue and orange tones on a minimal dark background
header.paragraph: We create tailor-made websites, apps, and AI integrations, without templates or generic solutions. Each service is designed to deliver real value: design with character, solid development, and digital strategies that help your project grow.

servicesList.paragraph: Every brand deserves a design that represents it. At Netneo we turn ideas into unique, functional, and memorable visual experiences. Whether for a website, app, or interface, we design with intention and a personal style.
Every business has its own rules. That’s why we develop applications built from scratch for what you really need. Fast, useful, and designed so your users enjoy them and you get results.
Your website is not just a presentation card: it’s a sales, connection, and positioning tool. We create functional, fast websites adapted to your strategy. No detours, no limits, no excuses.
We don’t just create interfaces, we also integrate digital brains. We automate responses, simplify processes, and improve user experience with useful and accessible AI for your business.
Having a good website isn’t enough if no one finds it. At Netneo we work SEO as part of the design, so your brand appears where it should: in the mind and search of your customers.

steps.title3: From <blue>idea</blue> to launch, step by step <pink>with you</pink>
steps.paragraph: Nothing left to chance. Every project follows a clear process so everything flows and the result is exactly what you need.

stepsList.title: Active listening
stepsList.imgAlt: Image of number 1 in light green color
stepsList.paragraph: We start by getting to know you: who you are, what you do, and what you really need. We don’t sell the same to everyone. It all begins with a conversation that makes the difference.

stepsList.title: Clear proposal
stepsList.imgAlt: Image of number 2 in light red color
stepsList.paragraph: We present you with a personalized solution, with realistic ideas, real timelines, and full transparency. No empty promises or small print.

stepsList.title: Original design
stepsList.imgAlt: Image of number 3 in light purple color
stepsList.paragraph: We give your project a visual shape. Unique designs focused on your brand, your client, and your goals. Because your work deserves more than a template.

stepsList.title: Professional development
stepsList.imgAlt: Image of number 4 in light orange color
stepsList.paragraph: We turn the design into something functional, optimized, and fast. Whether it’s a website, app, or AI integration, this is where the technical part… is done right.

stepsList.title: With you long-term
stepsList.imgAlt: Image of number 5 in light green color
stepsList.paragraph: We launch your project and stay with you. Support, improvements, evolution. We don’t let go of your hand after delivery.

faqs.paragraph: We know that before taking the first step, questions always arise. That’s why we’ve gathered here the most common questions about our services, processes, and timelines. Everything clear, no fluff.

faqsList.title: How long would it take to have my website or app ready?
faqsList.paragraph: It depends on the scope, but a website can be ready in 2 to 4 weeks. An app may take between 4 and 8 weeks. We’ll give you a clear timeline from the start.

faqsList.title: Do you also integrate artificial intelligence into projects?
faqsList.paragraph: Yes. We can integrate intelligent assistants, automations, chatbots, predictive analysis, and more — depending on your needs.

faqsList.title: Do you offer maintenance or support after delivering the site?
faqsList.paragraph: Yes. We don’t leave you on your own. We can take care of technical support, updates, improvements, or future evolutions.

faqsList.title: How much does a website with Netneo cost?
faqsList.paragraph: Every project is unique, but our basic websites start at €690. We always tailor the budget to your real needs.

faqsList.title: What do I need to have ready to start a project with you?
faqsList.paragraph: Nothing complicated: a clear idea of what you want to achieve and, if you have them, texts, images, or references. If not, we can help you with that too.

faqsList.title: Do you work with clients from all over the world?
faqsList.paragraph: Yes, we work with individuals and companies from any country. The entire process can be done online, hassle-free.

faqsList.title: Do you create online stores or e-commerce?
faqsList.paragraph: Yes, we build complete online stores, tailored to your products, with payment gateways, stock management, and a unique design.
